          based on IUCr Core CIF dictionary atom_site_disorder_assembly _name _atom_site_disorder_assembly _category atom_site _type char _list yes _list_reference _atom_site_label _example _detail A disordered methyl assembly with groups 1 and 2 B disordered sites related by a mirror S disordered sites independent of symmetry _definition A code which identifies a cluster of atoms that show long-range positional disorder but are locally ordered.

          based on IUCr Core CIF dictionary atom_site_disorder_group _name _atom_site_disorder_group _category atom_site _type char _list yes _list_reference _atom_site_label _example _detail 1 unique disordered site in group 1 2 unique disordered site in group 2 -1 symmetry-independent disordered site _definition A code which identifies a group of positionally disordered atom sites that are locally simultaneously occupied.
